thread.title: 3 indicted in bath salts conspiracy
thread.title_full: 3 indicted in bath salts conspiracy - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: 3 indicted in bath salts conspiracy
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - A big bust of synthetic drugs known as "bath salts."
Michael DePalma, 56, of Plainfield, New Hampshire, Louis Turcio, 51, of Springfield, Vermont, and Andrew Darling, 52, of North Walpole, New Hampshire, were indicted on federal drug conspiracy charges.
Federal prosecutors say the suspects ordered substantial amounts of bath salts over the internet from a supplier in China for sale in Vermont and New Hampshire.
If convicted, they could spend up to 20 years in prison.
